comment: The edges of a graph represented as ordered pair, shown as operation value. Although a little less intuitive, this representation is often used because it is shorter than the representation as function value of a graph given as ordered pair, see ~ edgopval . The representation ` ran E ` for the set of edges is even shorter, though. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 13-Oct-2020.)
